title: Lighted ceiling fans in living room and master bedroom
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 981-1065 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Home | Retail | Transit', "Make the most of your busy day at The Verdant Apartments, San Jose's newest village style apartment community.", "Verdant is walking distance to major employers such as Cisco, across from the Baypointe Light Rail Station, a short jog to the miles-long Coyote Creek Trail and features onsite retail and dining options at 'The Shops on Tasman'.", "At The Verdant Apartments in San Jose, CA, you won't sacrifice style for convenience.", 'Uniquely arranged one, two and three-bedroom homes include granite & stainless steel, warm woods, high intensity lighting, wide windows and high ceilings.', 'Outside your door, community amenities that will tempt you to play more and work less await.', "It's good to be home at The Verdant.", 'Features:', 'Oversized double-pane windows with 2" blinds, Granite counter tops and choice of maple or dark walnut cabinets, Private patios or balconies with French door, In-home washer and dryer, Generous pantry with adjustable shelves, Clean steel appliances: gas range, microwave and Energy Star® refrigerator & dishwasher, Lighted ceiling fans in living room and master bedroom, Contemporary track lighting in dining room, 9\' or 12\' ceilings with crown molding, Breakfast bar', 'Community Amenities:', 'Business center and WiFi café, Controlled access garage with elevators, Pet friendly!', '(breed restrictions apply),', "Clubhouse with eGame room, gourmet kitchen and private dining room, billiards and TV lounge, Meandering courtyards with barbecue areas, leading to main outdoor pavilion, Two-level, state-of-the-art fitness center with separate yoga and treadmill rooms, Ample resident parking with up to 2 free permits per home, Relaxing spa and lap pool, Additional storage available, Smoke-free community, On-site retail 'The shops onTasman', Walking distance to major employers, Baypointe light rail station and Coyote Creek trail", 'Pet Policy', 'We are pet friendly!', 'Please visit our website for additional details.', 'Follow This Link for More Information:',
